description.p: DuckStation is an simulator/emulator of the Sony PlayStation(TM) console, focusing on playability, speed, and long-term maintainability. The goal is to be as accurate as possible while maintaining performance suitable for low-end devices.
"Hack" options are discouraged, the default configuration should support all playable games with only some of the enhancements having compatibility issues.
